code: export var isLoggedIn=function isLoggedIn(){var data=localStorage.getItem("data");if(data==null){return false;}else{return true;}};export var doLogin=function doLogin(data,next){localStorage.setItem("data",JSON.stringify(data));next();};export var doLogout=function doLogout(next){localStorage.removeItem("data");next();};export var getCurrentUserDetails=function getCurrentUserDetails(){if(isLoggedIn){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("data")).user;}else{return{};}};export var checkAdmin=function checkAdmin(){var userRoles=getCurrentUserRole();if(userRoles==='ROLE_ADMIN'){return true;}else{return false;}};export var getCurrentUserRole=function getCurrentUserRole(){if(isLoggedIn){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("data")).user.role;}else{return{};}};export var getToken=function getToken(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("data")).token;};
